Information_1_2: ^Well, what can I do for ya?
^What do you know about the missing children?
^Is there anyone you think I should investigate?

c-0: ^Terrible shame. Good thing I never had children. Can't stand em.
^That's all you have to say!? Those children could be dead!

c-1: ^Hey now! Don't be spouting such nonsense! You'll start to sound like Ol' Sten!
^Honest, I keep too busy. Can't say I seen much.
c-2: ^Ain't got no quarrels with anyone in town. Don't listen to Ol' Sten though. He's crazy.

c-0: ^He believes in the spirits. If you ask me he's just scarin' the town.
